title: Your Lord and Savior

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ask any question during the night. You will learn the answer.
- Smite someone at night, killing them. (3 uses, ∞ if last Unseen)
- Reach out to someone at night. (0 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask.
- You cannot be promoted to the Assassin.
- You gain one use of your third ability every time an Unseen member that you didn’t convert dies.
- Reaching out to someone will convert them to the Unseen. If they are Town, they will be converted to their Unseen variant. If they are not Town, they will keep their role card but join your factional chat and gain your win condition.
- You may not be modkilled and effects that use the host to negatively affect you don't work. Additionally, the host must make a collage signifying your (the player's) glory and post it in your private channel before the game starts. You may share this collage at any time.
